# products

**Instance Property**

A list of products, one product for each valid product identifier provided in the original request.

## Declaration

```swift
var products: [SKProduct] { get }
```

## Discussion

The array consists of a list of [doc://com.apple.storekit/documentation/StoreKit/SKProduct] objects.

## Related Documentation

- **In-App Purchase Programming Guide**

## Response Information

- **invalidProductIdentifiers**: An array of product identifier strings that the App Store doesn’t recognize.
